posts.title: Advanced Python for Java Developers: Mastering the Art of Cross-Platform-Development

posts.title: Secure Communication with Certificate-Based Authentication: A Step-by-Step Guide to Implementing SSL/TLS
posts.excerpt: "Secure application authentication relies on Certificate Authorities (CAs) issuing trusted certificates for SSL handshakes, stored in TrustStores and retrieved via CertStores."

posts.title: Data Lake Storage Solutions: A Technical Guide to Apache HUDI Usage and Integration
posts.excerpt: "Apache HUDI optimizes data ingestion and processing through columnar storage, enabling up to 10x query performance improvements."
posts.author: Abstract Algorithms

posts.title: ElasticSearch DB vs Timeseries DB: A Scalability Patterns Analysis for Production-Ready Systems
posts.excerpt: "ElasticSearch leverages inverted indexes (O(n) construction, O(log n) search) and near real-time indexing for optimized search performance, whereas Timeseries DBs employ time-series optimized storage and query algorithms for low-latency data retrieval."
posts.author: Abstract Algorithms

posts.title: The Power of Inverted Indexing: A Deep Dive into ElasticSearch's Search Mechanism
posts.excerpt: "ElasitcSearch's inverted index leverages hash tables and trie data structures, optimizing query performance to O(log n) time complexity and 10x throughput improvement with partitioning."
posts.author: Abstract Algorithms
